Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Human beta-defensin 28 (hBD-28; hBD28; Human, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DSM1103 (MIC=37.5 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM681 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM1128 (MIC=37.5 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Streptococcus pneumoniae DSM11865 (MIC=37.5 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.15625724] It is slightly hemolytic (<12%) against human erythrocytes at the highest concentration of 500 μg/ml.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity gaginst Gram-positive and the Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Engineering disulfide bonds of the novel human beta-defensins hBD-27 and hBD-28 differences in disulfide formation and biological activity among human beta-defensins.
Literature.Author: Schulz A, Klüver E, Schulz-Maronde S, Adermann K.
